column1: Little Goat Diner////The rest of the food didn't fare so well.  The pork belly pancake was good..in theory.  But there wasn't enough pork belly!  By the end
column2: I had eaten all the pork
column3: had eaten most of the pancake (which was tasty...) but seriously had over a cup of the slaw left.  They pile on all the slaw to hide the fact there is hardly any meat!  My friend ate his burger
column5: but far from the best he'd ever had.
